alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morgan, western Johnson, northern Magoffin and northeastern Wolfe Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sellars, or 9 miles southwest of West Liberty, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lizzielane, Adele and Belknap around 230 PM EDT. Cannel City, Payton, Stacy Fork, Panama, Burg, Wheel Rim, Greear and Burkhart around 235 PM EDT. Lewis, Holliday, Caney, Lykins, Netty, Well Station, Epson, Malone, Cutuno and Gordon Ford around 240 PM EDT. Harper, Bethanna, Williams, White Oak, Hager, Ova, Cottle, Seiltz and Puncheon around 245 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
